RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIVERS OF DENIRO tracked the leaders into the turn while three wide, angled five wide to the clear in a long drive turning for home and closed well finding his best stride late. REIGNING DREAM stalked the pace through the turn, made a four wide bid from between horses in upper stretch, wore the pacesetter down in deep stretch and was caught by the winner in the final hundred yards. JUSTA LITTLE MOORE set a pressured pace from the fence to the quarter pole, shook off the presser in upper stretch but failed to hold off the closers in the final sixteenth. SHAKE THE FROST well placed in the early going to be just off the leaders, dropped back through the turn and rallied mildly along the fence in the lane. VERNON'S BEST brushed at the start, trailed to the turn while racing wide, closed ground to upper stretch and failed to sustain his bid. C V DYNAMIC was in tight quarters leaving the gate, trailed most of the way and was never a threat. TAHLEQUAH JOE dueled on the lead to the head of the lane and gave way through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Shake the Frost
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, dropped back, mild bid inside

ENTRY.NAME: C V Dynamic
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight break, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Justa Little Moore
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, shook clear, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Reigning Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid 4w, loomed between, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Vernon's Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed start, trailed wide, failed to sustain bid

ENTRY.NAME: Tahlequah Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled, gave way stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Rivers of Deniro
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: rally 5 wide, long drive, best stride late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SORORITY SISTER set a pressured pace from the fence for the first half mile, easily drew clear into the far turn, was kept to task through the lane while never threatened. STATE OF GRACE unhurried for the first half mile, rallied into the turn and made a steady advance to be second best. BIRDIE'S CHANTZ stalked the pace to the far turn and failed to respond when called upon while drifting out coming home. SAVESOMEFORME went evenly without ever posing a threat. WAR MOON pressed the pace in the first turn racing three wide between rivals and steadily faded. SPUN PRETTY raced four wide in the first turn bumping rival, rushed up to duel on the pace, gave way into the turn, was pulled up on the final turn having bled, and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Savesomeforme
ENTRY.COMMENT: one-paced, no threat, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: State of Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, steady advance, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Sorority Sister
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured early, cleared, drew off, kept to task, much best

ENTRY.NAME: War Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: press early, 3 wide, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Birdie's Chantz
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, failed to respond, drifted out

ENTRY.NAME: Spun Pretty
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped 1st turn, rushed, pressed pace, stopped, bled, walk off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 92. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pref erred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAKING ME CRAZY tracked the leaders from the fence down the backside, saved ground through the turn while passing rivals, tipped out in upper stretch and closed well to wear the pacesetter down in deep stretch. WOODLAND WALK set a pressured early pace, pulled clear through the turn, widened in upper stretch but could not hold off the closing winner late. MALIBU CLASSIC reserved off the leaders down the backstretch, circled five wide in the turn and ground out the show placing. UNCLE EARL pressed the pace to the quarter pole and weakened in the stretch. VENETIAN DREAM was unhurried to race mid-pack from four wide and failed to mount a rally. ROCK ON KITTEN failed to menace. AMIGO'S AFFAIR stalked the pace from three wide into the turn and faded. LORD OF LEGENDS broke a step slow while awkward and raced at the rear of the field as a non-factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Making Me Crazy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, saved ground, tipped out, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Woodland Walk
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured early, pulled clear, couldn't hold

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Earl
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Amigo's Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Rock On Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Venetian Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, 4 wide, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Lord of Legends
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Classic
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, circled 5 wide, up for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 42. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEZA PISTOL unhurried in the early going, rallied three wide in the turn under an early drive, drifted out to the five path in upper stretch and kept coming, wearing his rivals down through the lane. SEEKING FREEDOM stalked the pace down the backside, circled four wide to engage the leaders midway in the stretch and was out-finished late by the winner. LUCKY VICTOR set the pace on a clear lead to the head of the lane, responded when challenged in upper stretch and weakened inside the final sixteenth. LIVING THE DREAM reserved off the pace to the turn, cut the corner rallying turning for home, threatened in mid-stretch and flattened out. OLLIE'S FOLLY was unprepared at the start to break awkwardly, rushed up down the backside, raced rank to the turn, and came up empty in the lane. ONE STEP ASIDE contended early, dropped back entering the turn and posed no threat. KOZWHAT was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Victor
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, responded, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: One Step Aside
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Living the Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, cut corner, threatened inside, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Ollie's Folly
ENTRY.COMMENT: unprepared start, awkward, rushed up, rank, empty late

ENTRY.NAME: Heza Pistol
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, long drive 3w, 5path stretch, wore rivals down

ENTRY.NAME: Seeking Freedom
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, circled 4w, loomed, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Kozwhat
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor, outrun

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 30 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIVOLI pressed the pace through the turn from two wide, dueled with the pacesetter through the lane and pulled clear in the final hundred yards. QUARANTINO set a pressured pace from the fence to the head of the lane, dueled through the stretch, was out-finished late to be second best. LAST COOKIE reserved off the early pace, rallied two wide in the turn and kept on in the stretch to be up for the show from the inside. HITSVILLE tracked the leaders from three wide to the quarter pole and failed to gain ground down the stretch. MSHINDI well placed along the rail in striking distance in the turn and failed to respond when called upon. MAS ORO stalked the leaders through the turn and faded in the lane. NAPA DUDE was never a threat. CREATIVE BEAT was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Mshindi
ENTRY.OWNER: Hart Sr William D and Benain Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Napa Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat, never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Last Cookie
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, rally 2 wide, bid inside

ENTRY.NAME: Quarantino
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, responded, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Creative Beat
ENTRY.OWNER: Emerson Equistions LLC and Bestard Brian
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Rivoli
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, duel stretch, pulled clear

ENTRY.NAME: Mas Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Hitsville
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3 wide, failed to gain

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Glacial Princess S. MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 52. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR FILLIES, TWO YEARS OLD (OHIO ACCREDITED). $50 to nominate. $263 to enter and $487 to start with $75,000 Guaranteed. Purse to be divided: 60% to the winner; 20% to second; 10% to third; 5% to fourth; 3% to fifth; 2% to sixth. Weight: 122 lbs. Non-winne rs of a sweepstakes allowed 2 lbs.; Non-winners two races, 4 lbs.; Maidens, 6 lbs. Starters to be named through the entry box Monday, November 27, 2023 by the usual time of closing. Trophy presented to the winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWISTED JUSTICE sped up the fence to take command entering the main track, set a pressured early pace, opened a clear advantage at the head of the lane when called upon and drew off as much best without being threatened. DANZANITEAWAY bumped from the inside at the break, dropped to the rear of the field to be well back early, made up ground to the turn, circled five wide in the turn and steadily advanced down the lane to gain the place. FEELING EASY tracked the pacesetters down the backside, ranged up at the quarter pole and failed to sustain her bid in the lane finishing evenly. TIERNEY pressed the pace through the turn and weakened in the stretch drive. MAYBETHEONE broke outward bumping rival away from the gate, moved to a stalking position down the backside and flattened out in the stretch. LUCKY STUFF chased the early pace, pulled up at the three-eighths pole with an injury and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Twisted Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, cleared, pulled away, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Stuff
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, injured, pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Tierney
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Feeling Easy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, well placed, failed to sustain bid

ENTRY.NAME: Maybetheone
ENTRY.OWNER: Sparks Jerry S and Lopez Juana
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, bumped rival, stalked pace, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Danzaniteaway
ENTRY.OWNER: Barker Scott W and Barker Carol
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break, trailed, circled 5 wide, steady advance

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 70. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 30 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHO DA BOSS stalked the pace into the stretch, responded under right handed urging four wide to make the lead before the furlong marker, edged clear and just lasted under strong handling. DIAL DIRECT close from the start along the inside, bumped repeatedly with VILLIAN on the turn and the top of the stretch, split rivals two wide through mid stretch and just missed getting up in time. VILLIAN with the second flight two wide, was bumped on the turn then entering the stretch, altered course five wide and finished determinedly. COUNTEVERYBLESSING trailed into the stretch, swung wide and passed tiring rivals seven wide. GAPPER vied for lead the lead three wide into the stretch then faded. ROLL ON BIG O pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and weakened late. LUST FOR LIFE rushed to the lead, set a pressured pace along the inside into the stretch and gave way late. THE RIDER OF VILLIAN LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF DIAL DIRECT FOR INTERFERENCE ON THE TURN. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED DIAL DIRECT AND PLACED HIM THIRD.

ENTRY.NAME: Counteveryblessing
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, passed tiring rivals, 7 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lust for Life
ENTRY.OWNER: HMD Racing Stables LLC and Taste of Victory Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace inside, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Dial Direct
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, bumped repeatedly, split foes 2w, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Villian
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Hamm Shane
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight 2 wide, bumped turn, top lane, altered 5w, foul

ENTRY.NAME: Roll On Big O
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Gapper
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Who Da Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, dug in 4 wide, proved best, right handed urging,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Raimonde Farms LTD & Steve M. DeMaiolo

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ruff/Kirchberg Memorial S. MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 88. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR THREE-YEAR-OLDS AND UPWARD (OHIO ACCREDITED). $50 to nominate. $263 to enter and $487 to start with $75,000 Guaranteed. Purse to be divided: 60% to the winner; 20% to second; 10% to third; 5% to fourth; 3% to fifth; 2% to sixth. Weights: Three-Year-Ol ds 122 lbs.; Older 124 lbs.; Non-winners of a Sweepstakes at a mile or over in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; Two races other than maiden, claiming or starter at a mile or over in 2023, 4 lbs.; A race other than maiden, claiming or starter at a mile or over in 2023 , 6 lbs. Starters to be named through the entry box Monday, November 27, 2023 by the usual time of closing. If more than eight (8) horses are entered this race will be run at One Mile and Seventy Yards. Trophy presented to the winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OKLAHOMA JOE sped to the front from the gate, took a clear lead down the backside, widened his advantage through the turn and held on gamely late. CASUAL ATTIRE reserved off the pace to be mid-pack along the fence, rallied through traffic on the turn from three wide, emerged in the clear at the head of the lane to be closing inside rivals, and drifted out down the stretch while steadily gaining on the winner. RELISH THE RIDE slow early to be well off the lead to the far turn, rallied wide circling the field around the bend and finished with a good belated rally in the middle of the track. CONTROLLER settled in hand while racing two wide into the far turn, worked through rivals on the bend, angled inward in upper stretch and closed willingly through the lane. RED HEAD KID stalked the leaders from four wide down the backside, chased through the turn and failed to gain ground in the stretch drive. BIG TRUCK rated along the rail in the run down the backside, closed ground on the turn splitting rivals and made a mild bid in the lane. ROMANTIC COWBOY prompted the pace to the head of the lane and weakened down the stretch. THAT'S THE WAY unhurried early to be near the rear of the field and picked up positions in the stretch. PRESSLEY RIDGE trailed to the stretch and passed tiring rivals in the lane. FIRSTHAND JUSTICE well placed just off the leader down the backside, made a three wide bid in the turn and gave way coming home. FIRST SONG was parked six wide in the first turn, continued in that path down the backstretch while prominently placed and flattened out. DR. ZARNETT raced five wide through the first turn, settled near the rear of the main body down the backside and lacked a rally posing no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Oklahoma Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed, clear lead, widened advantage, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Pressley Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Relish the Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled field, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: That's the Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, gained position

ENTRY.NAME: Big Truck
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, split rivals upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Firsthand Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, early bid 3 wide, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Casual Attire
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, thru traffic, drifted out stretch, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Romantic Cowboy
ENTRY.OWNER: McDonald James H and Authentic Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Red Head Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4 wide, failed to gain

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Zarnett
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide 1st turn, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: First Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide 1st turn, contended 6 wide, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Controller
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Ella D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, rally four wide, angled in stretch, willingly
